input_text:
Job Title: Housekeeper-1st Shift-Lutheran

Location: Des Moines, IA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Overview

Perform routine housekeeping duties to include daily cleaning of patient rooms, restrooms, lounges, offices, classrooms, exam and waiting rooms, and corridors in accordance with standard operating procedures of the department.

Why UnityPoint Health?

Commitment to our Team – For the third consecutive year, we're proud to be recognized as a Top 150 Place to Work in Healthcare by Becker's Healthcare for our commitment to our team members. Culture – At UnityPoint Health, you matter. Come for a fulfilling career and experience a culture guided by uncompromising values and unwavering belief in doing what's right for the people we serve. Benefits – Our competitive Total Rewards program offers benefits options that align with your needs and priorities, no matter what life stage you’re in. Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Commitment – We’re committed to ensuring you have a voice that is heard regardless of role, race, gender, religion, or sexual orientation. Development – We believe equipping you with support and development opportunities is an essential part of delivering a remarkable employment experience. Community Involvement – Be an essential part of our core purpose—to improve the health of the people and communities we serve. 

Visit https://dayinthelife.unitypoint.org/ to hear more from our team members about why UnityPoint Health is a great place to work.

Responsibilities

 Follow step by step training Make Sure rooms are ready for patients, guests and staff Keep floors clean and sanitized Always keep patient information confidential Take our trash and laundry Move furniture and set up meeting rooms Report any repairs needed Clean equipment Follow all UnityPoint Health – Des Moines rules Help with emergency situations as needed Perform other duties when assigned

Qualifications

Education: High school diploma or equivalent preferred. Must be 18 years of age.

Experience: Previous housekeeping experience preferred. Must be able to safely lift bags of laundry, trash or equipment weighing up to 50 pounds. Must be able to read, write, speak and understand fluent English.

Area of Interest: Support Services;FTE/Hours per pay period: 1.0;Department: Environmental Services- Luth;Shift: 7am-3:30pm with weekend rotation;Job ID: 147505;

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Maintain cleanliness and sanitation of floors
Move furniture and set up meeting rooms

other.content: Commitment to team, culture, diversity, equity, inclusion, development, community involvement

High school diploma or equivalent preferred, must be 18 years of age, previous housekeeping experience preferred, ability to lift up to 50 pounds, reading, writing, speaking, and understanding fluent English
